import React ,{Component} from 'react' import Comment from './comments' export default class IssuePage extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { issue:[], backendServer: 'http://localhost:8080/', id:this.props.match.params.id, currentComment:"", currentCommentInfo:[] } }; componentDidMount(){ fetch(this.state.backendServer +"issue/"+ this.state.id) .then(response=>response.json()) .then((data) => { this.setState({ issue:data, }) }) .catch(console.log) } addComment(event){ event.preventDefault(); console.log(this.state.currentCommentInfo.commenterName) fetch(this.state.backendServer+'issue/comment/'+this.state.issue[0].issueId+'&' +this.state.currentCommentInfo.commenterName+'&' +this.state.currentCommentInfo.commenterPhoto+'&' +this.state.currentCommentInfo.commenterDate+'&' +this.state.currentCommentInfo.commenterText+'&' +this.state.currentCommentInfo.commenterTime, { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, }) } handleCommentChange(e){ this.setState({ currentComment:e.target.value, currentCommentInfo: { "commenterName":sessionStorage.Name, "commenterPhoto":sessionStorage.Photo, "commentText":e.target.value, "commentDate":"12/1/2018", "commentTime": "1:23 PM" } }) } render(){ console.log(this.state) return(
{this.state.issue.map((issue) => (
{issue.issueId}
<>
))}
) } }
